summary: After being released from prison, notorious thief Roy Earle is hired by his old boss to help a group of inexperienced criminals plan and carry out the robbery of a California resort.
cast: Ida Lupino|Humphrey Bogart|Alan Curtis|Arthur Kennedy|Joan Leslie|Henry Hull|Henry Travers|Jerome Cowan|Minna Gombell|Barton MacLane|Elisabeth Risdon|Cornel Wilde|Donald MacBride|Paul Harvey|Isabel Jewell|Willie Best|Spencer Charters|George Meeker|Robert Strange|John Eldredge|Sam Hayes|Zero the Dog|Eddie Acuff|Erville Alderson|Dorothy Appleby|Peter Ashley|Arthur Aylesworth|James Blaine|Wade Boteler|Lucia Carroll|Eddy Chandler|Davison Clark|Richard Clayton|Clancy Cooper|Frank Cordell|James Flavin|William Gould|Carl Harbaugh|Harry Hayden|Louis Jean Heydt|Robert Emmett Keane|Al Lloyd|George Lloyd|Gerald Mackey|Frank Moran|Jack Mower|Garry Owen|Lee Phelps|Paul Power|Jack Rutherford|Ralph Sanford|Paul Stathes|Buster Wiles|Maris Wrixon|Charlotte Wynters
